step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see we are already on the password recovery page titled 'Lost password | OpenStreetMap'. The page has a form for password recovery with a text field for entering an email address (bid '106') and a 'Reset password' button (bid '107'). Since the goal was to find the password recovery page, and we are already on it, I should inform the user that we've successfully found the password recovery page and explain how to use it.
step_data.action: stop('I have found the password recovery page. This page allows you to reset your password by entering the email address you used to sign up. After entering your email and clicking the "Reset password" button, the system will send you a link that you can use to reset your password.')
